quotes.quote: The theater needs continual reminders that there is nothing more debasing than the work of those who do well what is not worth doing at all.
Fishing is a constant reminder of the democracy of life, of humility, and of human frailty. The forces of nature discriminate for no man.
It is the mission of art to remind man from time to time that he is human, and the time is ripe, just now, today, for such a reminder.
Multiculturalism is a good reminder that when standards are relative, there are no standards at all.
Setting goals is the first important step in achieving success in an activity. It's a reminder of what you are working towards.
In the particular presence of memorable language we can find a reminder of our ability to know and retain knowledge itself. The brightness wherein all things come to see.
The reminder that there are people who have worse troubles than you is not an effective pain killer.
Imperfections are not inadequacies; they are reminders that we're all in this together.
Sometimes we need the salt of tears to remind us how to savor the sweetness of life.
It is a painful reminder that even the most well-intentioned among us sometimes act in ways that put children in danger of being abused or neglected.
Sitting alone, listening to the sound of your breath, the beating of your heart is a reminder that you are sacred and blessed.
A real miracle's a reminder and a warning that the line that separates the possible from the impossible isn't as firm as we like to think it is.
It's a reminder of one of the greatest lessons of all: live as if you'll live forever, but live each day as if it were your last.
People of the world will reject your reminders, because it reminds them that this world is temporary.
Just a reminder, what other people think of you is none of your business.
Feeling irritated, restless, afraid, and hopeless is a reminder to listen more carefully.
Whatever you are struggling with, is a reminder for you to find your true purpose in this lifetime.
Perhaps we just need little reminders from time to time that we are already dignified, deserving, worthy.
Occasionally, we are given a reminder of how precious a gift it is to understand the plan of salvation.
When you face adversity, you need to remind yourself that whatever is trying to defeat you could very well be what God will use to promote you.
The question of dying becomes a wise reminder. It cures us of our innocence of the future.
The snow, the wind, the sun and the sounds of nature, can all be reminders to you that you're an integral part of the natural world.
Having two older brothers is a healthy reminder that you're always closer to the bottom than you are to the top.
Pain redeems all. It is the awareness of life, a reminder of death.
Sometimes a shock to the system is a good thing, you know? Like a reminder that you're alive.
The things surrounding you in your home serve as subliminal reminders of who you are.
